RTCIceCandidatePairStatsRemoteCandidateI.summary: The remoteCandidateId property of the dictionary uniquely identifies the remote {{Glossary("ICE")}} candidate which was analyzed to generate the used to compute the statistics for this pair of candidates.
RTCIceCandidatePairStatsRemoteCandidateI.value: A string uniquely identifying the remote ICE candidate—that is, the candidate describing a configuration for the remote peer—which is represented by the remote end of these statistics.
